title: Free Rotation
body: I'm levelling a new account at the moment, and I'm level 10, and I'm still stuck on the champion rotation you're supposed to have until level 6. I'm sick of Brand and Illaoi being my only champions, I'm just wondering whether they changed the Free Rotation to a higher level or if something strange is happening, cheers.

replies.body: Same problem here, I have an account where I try new champs and I'm stuck with the very same champs you are :/
Yo I just levelled up to lvl 11 and I unlocked it
